attributes.action: Conscript all legal and illegal immigrants and migrants (including NI)
attributes.additional_details:
The crime stats have risen in conjunction with immigration statistics. Systems are at breaking point due to increasing number of people that are depending on them (housing, benefits, NHS etc.)
Many crossings to the UK have a high number of deaths due to the risks taken.
Conscription would deter many from the dangerous travel. Northern Ireland should be included as they could use Northern Ireland as the scapegoat to enjoy the rights and benefits of being in the UK without having to serve.
attributes.background: The government should conscript all illegal and legal immigrants and migrants (with the inclusion of Northern Ireland).

rejection.details: We can only publish a petition if we have the full name of the petition creator, which is published alongside the petition text.
